tool_input.prompt:
Examine the workflows controller at packages/cli/src/workflows/workflows.controller.ts. Focus on:
1. Existing endpoint patterns and structure
2. Authentication/authorization mechanisms used
3. Error handling patterns  
4. Response format conventions
5. How workflows are currently accessed and managed
6. Integration with workflow services
7. Any existing bulk or batch operation patterns

Provide a detailed analysis of the current structure to understand how to best integrate bulk workflow operations.
